version_description: QR Code Scanner is now optimized for iOS 11, iPad Pro and iPhone X!
QR Code Scanner is now optimized for iOS 11, iPad Pro and iPhone X!

For this version we have prepared a stunning new design and some awesome features, including:
• Creator - Now you can generate your personalized QR Code
• History - Save all created QR Codes in your history to access them later
• Design improvement - We hope you like our new design!
• Minor bug fixed
For any help please contact: support@wzp.solutions

QrScan is designed to scan QR codes and barcodes with ease.

What’s new:
QrScan fully supports iOS 12 for an even faster and more responsive experience.

Please leave your review on the AppStore or send your feedback to support@wzp.solutions

Bugs exist everywhere as well as in code. Forget one and they multiply. But one day our big bad developer came along and gobbled all the little bugs up in one big bite. So enjoy the updated, bug-free app.

For any help please contact: support@wzp.solutions

Now optimized for iOS 13!
To celebrate, we polished our design to bring you a new beautiful interface!

For this version, we've prepared some great new features including:

• Dark Mode
Protect your eyes from bright light and save your battery life.

• New Design
Get the app with a brand new design.

Please leave your review on the App Store or send your feedback to support@airapps.co

Dear Friend,

Thank you for entering my life.
For the last year, I have been through so many different stages, like many bugs fixing, new features, different colors, and through all of the good and bad times, you have been with me.
I couldn’t thank you enough for that.

So I only wanted to say once again, thanks for staying with me.

Your lovely QrScan!

PS: Love the app? Rate me! Your feedback means a lot to me.
